transitions.colors: color, background-color, border-color, text-decoration-color, fill, stroke 200ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)

headline.className: text-4xl font-heading font-normal mb-4 text-foreground tracking-normal

subtext.text: We believe the best tools disappear into the background, letting you focus on what matters.

body.text: Outline was built by a small team who got tired of over-engineered software. We set out to create something different: tools that are simple, fast, and respectful of your attention. No bloat, no noise, just what you need.

description.text: Every feature earns its place. We remove more than we add.
Fast by default. No loading spinners, no waiting.
Your data is yours. We don't sell it, share it, or mine it.
Built with care and attention to every detail.

heading.className: text-4xl font-heading font-normal mb-4 text-foreground tracking-normal

subtext.text: Questions, feedback, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.

items.className: relative rounded-xl border border-border bg-card p-6 sm:p-8 shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md

quote.text: We switched from Notion and never looked back. Outline is faster, simpler, and respects our workflow instead of imposing one.

items.className: relative rounded-xl border border-border bg-card p-6 sm:p-8 shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md

quote.text: Finally, a tool that gets out of the way. The writing experience is perfect, and the API lets us build exactly what we need.

items.className: relative rounded-xl border border-border bg-card p-6 sm:p-8 shadow-sm transition-all hover:shadow-md

quote.text: The speed is unreal. Search, navigation, editing, everything happens instantly. This is what modern software should feel like.

eyebrow.className: inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-primary/20 bg-primary/10 px-3 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-primary mb-4

header.className: text-3xl font-heading font-normal tracking-normal text-foreground sm:text-4xl lg:text-5xl mb-4

subtext.text: Everything you need to know to get started.

a.text: Outline is free for up to 5 team members. After that, it's a simple per-seat price with no tiers, no feature gating, and no surprises.

q.text: Can I import from other tools?

a.text: Yes. We support one-click import from Notion, Confluence, Google Docs, and Markdown files. Your data comes over cleanly with formatting intact.
The web app works offline with automatic sync when you reconnect. The desktop app has full offline support built in.
All data is encrypted at rest and in transit. We run on SOC 2 Type II certified infrastructure with regular third-party security audits.
Absolutely. We provide Docker images and detailed documentation for running Outline on your own infrastructure with full feature parity.
